description:
Only chickens escape! Take the chance to fight for your life in this charged-up endless arcade, free-roaming racing game. 
Select your post-apocalyptic modified vehicle and drive it through the deserted ruins of a wasted world while trying to defend yourself against the motorized oil-cult scavengers hunting you down to seize your fuel... and your flesh!
Explore three different locations and challenge yourself with deadly daily missions.
Be MAD or be DEAD!

GAME FEATURES
- Survive as long as you can against SPIKED BUGGIES, ARMORED FLAME-THROWERS, TANK-CARS, WAR RIGS, and many more enemies
- Use high lines, ramps, and hills to challenge your haunters
- Master 60+ completely different vehicles
- Unlock loads of aggressive and defensive special gears to empower your vehicle
- Find your perfect vehicle+gear balance
- Challenge yourself in smashing the enemies without the gears' support
- Enter a gorgeous isometric 3D “voxel” world 
- Earn money while avoiding explosive obstacles
- Race in 3 thematic maps with different game-modes
name: Fury Roads Survivor
